name: secenv
description: The Breeze: Secret management without the overhead

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:bin
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js tests/integration
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js tests/e2e --runInBand
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js tests/performance --runInBand
scripts.test:security: npm run build && node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/jest/bin/jest.js tests/security
